title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.1 - Purpose of reserve
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1647-4.1 - Purpose of reserve

State Regulations

The purpose of the replacement reserve is to accumulate
funds for the replacement of selected categories of fixed assets at the end of
their useful lives, such replacement being necessary to maintain or restore the
utility, function or revenue-producing capacity of the project over its
statutory life. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1647-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
